# uDOS Credits & Acknowledgments

**Version:** Alpha v1.0.0.68
**Last Updated:** 2026-01-07
**Auto-Generated:** Yes (by `python -m core.services.credits_sync`)

This document acknowledges the open-source libraries, fonts, and projects that make uDOS possible.

---

## ðŸ“š Library Credits

### Text Editors

| Library | Author | License | Repository | Description |
|---------|--------|---------|------------|-------------|
| **Micro Editor** | Zachary Yedidia | MIT | [zyedidia/micro](https://github.com/zyedidia/micro) | Modern and intuitive terminal-based text editor |

### Markdown & Documentation

| Library | Author | License | Repository | Description |
|---------|--------|---------|------------|-------------|
| **Typo Markdown Editor** | Ross Robino | MIT | [rossrobino/typo](https://github.com/rossrobino/typo) | Clean markdown editor with live preview and .udos.md support |
| **URL to Markdown** | uDOS Wizard Server | MIT | [iw4p/url-to-markdown](https://github.com/iw4p/url-to-markdown) | Convert web pages to Markdown format |
| **MarkdownDB** | Datopian | MIT | [datopian/markdowndb](https://github.com/datopian/markdowndb) | SQL-based Markdown file database for structured content queries |
| **Marp** | Marp Team | MIT | [marp-team/marp](https://github.com/marp-team/marp) | Markdown presentation ecosystem - create slides with Markdown |
| **Remark** | uDOS Wizard Server | MIT | [gnab/remark](https://github.com/gnab/remark) | Markdown to slideshow presentation tool |
| **Markdown to PDF** | uDOS Wizard Server | MIT | [JayJay1024/markdown-to-pdf](https://github.com/JayJay1024/markdown-to-pdf) | Convert Markdown documents to PDF format |

### Voice & Audio

| Library | Author | License | Repository | Description |
|---------|--------|---------|------------|-------------|
| **Handy STT** | CJ Pais | MIT | [cjpais/Handy](https://github.com/cjpais/Handy) | Free, open source speech-to-text application. Completely offline using Whisper or Parakeet models. |
| **Piper TTS** | OHF Voice | GPL-3.0 | [OHF-Voice/piper1-gpl](https://github.com/OHF-Voice/piper1-gpl) | Fast, local neural text-to-speech system. Supports 30+ languages with natural-sounding voices. |

### AI & Machine Learning

| Library | Author | License | Repository | Description |
|---------|--------|---------|------------|-------------|
| **Mistral Vibe CLI** | Mistral AI | Apache-2.0 | [mistralai/mistral-vibe](https://github.com/mistralai/mistral-vibe) | Mistral's open-source CLI coding assistant. Interactive AI agent for codebase exploration, modification, and development tasks. |
| **Songscribe** | Gabe Serna | MIT | [gabe-serna/songscribe](https://github.com/gabe-serna/songscribe) | Turn any song into sheet music. ML-powered instrument separation, audio-to-MIDI conversion, and score generation. |
| **Gemini CLI** | uDOS Wizard Server | Apache-2.0 | [google-gemini/gemini-cli](https://github.com/google-gemini/gemini-cli) | Google Gemini AI assistant for terminal |
| **Ollama Local AI** | uDOS Dev | MIT | [https://ollama.com/download](https://ollama.com/download) | Run LLMs locally - offline AI for uDOS Vibe CLI. No cloud, no API keys, full privacy. |

### Form Tools

| Library | Author | License | Repository | Description |
|---------|--------|---------|------------|-------------|
| **GTX Form** | Community | MIT | [gtx-form/gtx-form](https://github.com/gtx-form/gtx-form) | Typeform-style form builder with React and Vite |

## ðŸŽµ Groovebox Audio Credits

Audio synthesis and data transmission using MML (Music Macro Language)

### Sound Design

**Imperial Data Transport**
- Author: uDOS Team
- License: Public Domain / CC0
- Dark synth sounds for acoustic data transfer - mathematically generated, no external samples
- Influences: 80s Synthesizer music, Star Wars Imperial aesthetic, Dialup modem sounds, Vocoder effects

### MML Standard

**Music Macro Language (MML)** (Public Domain)

Standard music notation format from 1970s-80s home computers

Historical implementations:
- NEC PC-8801 (1981)
- MSX BASIC (1983)
- Sharp X68000 (1987)
- Commodore 64 SID

### Musical Standards

**Musical Scale Frequencies** (Public Domain)

Standard A440 tuning with 12-TET temperament (International standard (ISO 16))

---

## ðŸŽ¨ Retro Style Influences

| System | Era | Influence on uDOS |
|--------|-----|-------------------|
| **Teletext/Ceefax** | 1970s-2000s | Tile-based information display, 40-column layouts, block graphics |
| **BBC Micro** | 1981 | Mode 7 teletext graphics, educational computing philosophy |
| **Commodore 64** | 1982 | PETSCII character graphics, retro color palettes |
| **AmigaOS** | 1985 | Workbench aesthetics, copper bars, four-color schemes |
| **MS-DOS** | 1981-2000 | Command-line interface patterns, text-mode UI |
| **ANSI Art** | 1980s-1990s | Terminal graphics, BBS aesthetic |

## ðŸ”„ Maintaining Credits

Credits are auto-generated from container manifests. To update:

```bash
# Check credits status
python -m core.services.credits_sync --check

# Sync credits from containers
python -m core.services.credits_sync

# Regenerate CREDITS.md
python -m core.services.credits_sync --generate-md
```
